mapper.insert: insert into repair (rent_id, message, report, state) values (#{rentId}, #{message}, current_timestamp, 0)
mapper.update: update repair set message = #{message}, report = current_timestamp where repair_id = #{repairId}
mapper.select: select a.repair_id, a.rent_id, a.user_id, a.message, a.report, a.fix, a.price, a.remark, a.state, b.name, c.house_name from repair as a, user as b, house as c, rent as d where d.rent_id = a.rent_id and c.house_id = d.house_id and a.user_id = b.user_id and a.repair_id = #{repairId}
mapper.update: update repair set remark = #{remark}, price = #{price}, user_id = #{userId}, fix = current_timestamp, state = 1 where repair_id = #{repairId}
